allow: Bash(python -c "import json, sys; data = json.load(sys.stdin); print(''''Full sync triggered:''''); print(f""Success: {data.get(''''success'''', False)}""); print(f""Message: {data.get(''''message'''', ''''N/A'''')}"")")

Bash(python -c "import json, sys; d = json.load(sys.stdin); ls = d[''''data''''][''''latestSync'''']; print(f""Latest sync: {ls[''''status'''']}""); print(f""Records: {ls[''''recordsProcessed'''']}""); print(f""Started: {ls[''''startedAt'''']}""); print(f""Completed: {ls.get(''''completedAt'''', ''''Still running...'''')}""); print(f""Sync type: {ls[''''syncType'''']}"")")
